short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gateway plugin for interaction with colony framework native tools

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Access extra features through the colony gateway
• Use the printer driver directly
• Print files using the printing language
• Access the native Operative System API
